Equipment.name: GPS_NETWORK_SIMULATOR1
Equipment.description: Gps Network simulator used for GPS test cases

Parameter.name: Model
Parameter.description: Model of equipment to use. Refer to Equipment_Catalog.xml

Parameter.name: Transport
Parameter.description: Transport used to connect the equipment

Parameter.name: BaudRate
Parameter.description: Baud rate used for serial port communication

Parameter.name: ConnectionRetry
Parameter.description: The number of retry in case of SERIAL connection
